name: Martial Music Matchup
description:
Play as Coda or Grace and participate in the National Musician School Competition! Match 3 orbs in a row to boost your performance in order to rise to the top!

Developed by Gold Team. Developed for UCF's Spring 2017 Casual Production Course.

  • Tech Lead - Angel
  • Art Lead - Lily
  • Everything because he is amazing - Josh
